sentences.sContent: The opposite side of the earth; the antipodes .
sentences.sContent_eng: The opposite side of the earth; the antipodes .
sentences.sCn: 对跖面，对跖点地球的对面；相对极。

remMethod.val: anti (相反) + podes (脚； 底部) → 相对极

trans.tranOther: either or both of two points, places, or regions that are situated diametrically opposite to one another on the earth's surface, esp the country or region opposite one's own
